io.micronaut.context.scope

Interface CustomScope<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - An annotation type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RefreshScope

    @Indexed(value=CustomScope.class)
public interface CustomScope<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Represents a custom scope within the BeanContext.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
    See Also:
    Scope
